text: "Pulling Mussels (from the Shell)" is a 1980 song by British band Squeeze. It was taken from their third studio album Argybargy. It went to number 44 in the United Kingdom and became one of their most popular songs although it never charted in the United States. ==Track listing== 7-inch vinyl # "Pulling Mussels (From the Shell)" # "What The Butler Saw" ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Squeeze (band) songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Jangle pop songs
title: Pulling Mussels (from the Shell)
